Tools.title: We work with the best technologies on the
Tools.description: At Syntek, we use leading tools to ensure quality, innovation, and optimal performance. In a constantly evolving digital world, having your own website is not a luxury it's a necessity.
Tools.Figma: Figma is a collaborative interface design tool.
Tools.Premiere: Adobe Premiere is a video editing software.
Tools.Nodejs: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime environment.
Tools.Nextjs: Next.js is a React framework for building server-side rendered applications.
Tools.TailwindCSS: TailwindCSS is a utility-first CSS framework.
Tools.Photoshop: Photoshop is a popular digital image editing software.
Tools.Ilustrator: Adobe Illustrator is a vector graphics software.
Tools.Wordpress: WordPress is a free and open-source content management system.
Tools.React: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
Tools.GitHub: GitHub is the leading platform for code collaboration.

About.title: Learn more about
About.antto-p1: Specialist in branding and UX/UI design, proficient in Figma, Illustrator, Photoshop, and video editing.
About.antto-p2: Combines strategy and creativity to develop visual identities that connect with the audience and reinforce each brand's message.
About.antto-p3: Has worked on innovative projects, designing brands that reflect modernity, functionality, and market differentiation.
About.antto-p4: Every brand tells a story, and my job is to make it visually powerful.
About.nico-p1: Full stack developer with 2 years of experience, specialized in MERN, PERN, and WordPress technologies, skilled in React, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and TypeScript.
About.nico-p2: Blends logic and design to create robust, scalable web applications focused on user experience.
About.nico-p3: Has taken part in innovative projects, developing digital solutions known for their performance, functionality, and modern aesthetics.
About.nico-p4: Every line of code is part of a solution, and my job is to build products that truly make a difference.
About.card1-description: At SYNTTEK, we are two creative and technical minds working as a team: a graphic designer specialized in UI/UX and a programmer focused on efficient web development. We are united by the idea of creating websites that work, connect, and represent.
About.card2-description: We design and develop custom websites focused on user experience, brand identity, and performance. From institutional pages to more complex platforms, we create digital products that enhance our clients' growth and online presence.
About.card3-description: We merge design and development from the start, working in an agile and personalized way. We rely on usability principles, programming best practices, and aesthetics aligned with your identity. This way, your website is not just another channel but an active tool for growth.

Faqs.title: Common Questions
Faqs.question1: Why do I need a website if I already have social media?
Faqs.answer1: A website gives you authority, better Google ranking, full control over your content, and higher conversion rates. It's key for sustainable growth.
Faqs.question2: How long does it take to develop a professional website?
Faqs.answer2: It depends on the project's complexity, but at Synttek, we offer fast and efficient solutions. Standard websites typically take 2 to 4 weeks, while custom developments may take longer.
Faqs.question3: Can you create an online store with WooCommerce for my business?
Faqs.answer3: Absolutely! WooCommerce is one of our specialties. We build intuitive, secure, and optimized online stores to maximize conversions and improve user experience.
Faqs.question4: How do you ensure my website looks good on mobile devices?
Faqs.answer4: We apply responsive design and conduct testing on various devices to ensure an optimal experience on smartphones and tablets.
Faqs.question5: How is the security of my website ensured?
Faqs.answer5: We implement SSL, protection against attacks, regular updates, and backups to keep your site always protected.
Faqs.question6: Can you help me with my company's branding and visual identity?
Faqs.answer6: Yes, and it's one of our strengths. We design strong, modern visual identities aligned with your business values. From logos to brand strategy, we build a professional and memorable image.
Faqs.question7: How do payments and revisions work in a project with Synttek?
Faqs.answer7: Once the quote is approved, we sign a contract detailing the project, including timelines and payment terms. By default, 50% is paid upfront and the remaining 50% upon completion. The agreement includes two rounds of revisions on the defined design to fine-tune details before final delivery.
